title: Job Competency Strengthening and Open Education Practices Through University Core Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level cultural studies knowledge at the university level, basic digital technology application skills
context.additional_context: Core language curriculum based on blended learning experiences at remote universities, involving students from diverse academic backgrounds, with an emphasis on developing job competencies through critical thinking and technology utilization

learning_goals: Students can analyze and apply job competencies required in cultural research fields using Open Educational Resources (OER).
Learners can complete assignments reflecting critical thinking by utilizing digital technologies (collaboration tools, content creation platforms, etc.) in blended learning environments.
Participants can design flexible job skills that meet industry demands based on course content and improve them according to feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
